lender.name: Bill and Mickey
lender.loan_because: we are so lucky with our family - they are all happy and healthy. We need to share

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I lived in rural Nicaragua for a summer and my host family really could have used some of these loans. They were really entrepreneurial, but there was no microfinance available there at the time.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to do research that will help our government healthcare systems work better.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone with a dream deserves a chance at it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a lab assistant at the college I am attending

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: They need it , I have the possibility to do it, and I believe in it.
lender.occupational_info: As a deputy department manager, I am assisting my boss in managing and leading the various teams of the department (100 people), to fulfil our objectives (to increase the quantity and quality of our production, and to decrease the lead times). That could be working on implementing new methods to improve the quality of our network, building new means to measure our performances, creating synergies between the teams to make the work easier and faster, and many more themes.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel called to sell all of my things and give the money to those who need it more than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Youth Ministry and Biblical Studies at a Chicago University.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: On my 50th birthday a friend gave me a Kiva credit - a great gift, which enables me to support vibrant women on an ongoing basis. All of my loans to Vietnamese women have been repaid to date, so I am increasing the credit I make available - with a new focus on Samoa, which I am about to visit!

lender.name: Cristina
lender.whereabouts: Castanheira do Ribatejo Castanheira do Ribatejo

lender.name: Rob&Maureen
lender.loan_because: It is possible to make this a better world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secondary school (grades 7-12) administrator.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: because its for a good cause.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: Reciprosity
lender.occupational_info: fragmented, ,uneasy- all questions, no answers~

lender.name: Cinthya and Jeff
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate enough during our lives to receive help when we needed it and we believe in people's ability to change their own lives.

lender.name: Karri
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who work hard and deserve a hand up with their business. I have a soft spot for single mothers because I am also a single mom.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Canada who is surrently ugrading high school courses and getting ready for an education in health care.

lender.name: kristian
lender.occupation: SBL operatør for EMGS sea blogging
lender.occupational_info: my work is for finding matarial oil for emgs sea blogging.

lender.name: Cecile & Greg
lender.loan_because: Because I DO have a 25$ hanging around !

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage internet software projects by making sure they get done on time and according to budget. I also take photographs and design websites in my spare time.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Bea
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing

lender.name: Laure
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: it is so important to me to invest in the lives of people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people keep their smiles healthy.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I care, and believe in generating good will all around.

lender.name: Kyleen Carlson
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just a little help is all someone needs to be successful. I've been a self-employeed hairdresser for 16+ years...it's a wonderful profession and I wish these hairdressers good business and the best of luck! Keep your clients happy and you'll always be in business!

lender.name: Keishi
lender.loan_because: It's a hand up, not just a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently participating in an exchange program in Japan.

lender.name: Aily
lender.loan_because: it's one small way I could contribute to our humanity.

lender.name: Isaiaha
lender.loan_because: one by one we can make a difference

lender.name: Ed & Rhonnie
lender.loan_because: we want to develop ourselves fully as individuals and to facilitate that growth in others.
lender.occupational_info: We help people build wealth through buying and selling real estate.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: Free/cheap credit is all people need to become self sufficient . Kiva is a simple way of trying,in a very small way ,to redress the huge imbalance of opportunities in the world.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We, in the US, have so much and others have so little. It is my duty and my honor to lend money through your wonderful organization. I look forward to adding more money over time. The good feeling I get is priceless. Thank you so very much for giving me the mechanism to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a RN in a Seattle, WA hospital and I recover patients immediately after they come out of surgery.

lender.name: Andrea Christina
lender.loan_because: I love to give and share. We are one.
lender.occupational_info: full of joy and happiness

lender.name: V+M
lender.loan_because: to help people in need and to improve their lives... and most importantly to make the world a better place.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I consider myself a Global Citizen and relish in the fact that I can help my neigbours and friends in other parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: I protect the people and property where I work.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I like to support women entrepreneurs. I think more money in woman's hands might lead to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage big Web sites

lender.name: Ramu
lender.loan_because: I am proud to see some smile

lender.name: Vijay
lender.occupation: Regional Secretary for Project in A.P.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives a practical route to brotherhood.

lender.name: Anya
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life and so now I want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I make people feel beautiful by cutting and coloring their hair.

lender.name: Kavitha
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in many ways and would like to help others who have the determination and will but not the funds to make a decent living.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse taking care of cancer patients when they are admitted into the hospital.

lender.name: Conor
lender.loan_because: A person that I like told me it was a good idea. When I looked for myself I could see that it was.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that is dedicated to the prevention of money laundering and fraud, with particular focus on the prevention of counter-terrorist finanacing. It sounds cool - but my role is just to help selling software!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me a gift certificate for my birthday and I think this is a good Christian thing to do. I plan on making more loans when this loan is repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I study hard to be an honor roll student.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I think they deserve the money to help there store, buisness, and other things.

lender.name: Kumla Kakbank
lender.loan_because: It´s a good thing!
lender.occupational_info: We meet, eat cookies and lend out money.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be in a place where I have had opportunities to better myself and I want to help people like me - people that want better and who are working hard to achieve their goals and don't expect a handout. I believe it is important to pay it forward.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams!

lender.name: Hideki
lender.loan_because: The concept of kiva is wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: Web Production

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: i loan because i care

lender.name: Tristan
lender.occupational_info: I am a hopsital doctor specialising in sexual health and HIV medicine

lender.name: Aristoteles
lender.loan_because: invest in people's potential is the most effective way to build a better world.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: i want to encourage anyone to follow their dreams! create the life you wish to lead for yourself and your family!
lender.occupational_info: i have a small retail shop and an online boutique. i also do consulting and retail planning

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Even though for America I don't have a lot, as a citizen of the planet I have much more than many. I know my own struggles to survive and I live in a country of plenty. I can only imagine the struggles for people in developing countries. It's important to help others to have a good life and to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for a hightech company. I sit at a desk in front of a computer all day. I am single so do not have a husband to bring in a second income (2 incomes are needed in America), so I have a little farm where I raise my own meat, eggs, vegetables. I give when I can.

lender.name: Pooja
lender.loan_because: I want to give opportunities to those who want to work hard to make their lives and their children's lives better. Even though what I give is a small amount, it can be of high value to the borrower after collecting from many lenders. I live in the US now, but came from a developing country Nepal. I believe that we all can help each other to make lives better. But it cannot be done without hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD student. Majority of the time I do research in molecular biology. I love learning about life from molecular level to cellular level, to organismic level. I sometimes teach Cell Biology to students.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: of the love of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and met people whose generosity and spirit abounded. I have met people who gave to me when they had so little. And this is a time in my life I can afford to repay some of the debt I owe.

lender.name: Collin
lender.loan_because: The world can be better

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to life their dreams!

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and arrange for children to get to school.

lender.name: sriram
lender.loan_because: lack for 100000$
lender.occupational_info: distribution for hindustan uniliver limited

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: a small amount can help someone else. Everyone can give back and everyone can make a difference.

lender.name: Merilee
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a way that helps people become self-sufficient. It builds self esteem and is good for the economy!
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home and take care of my children.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: The earth is the Lord's, and everything in it. -Psalm 24:1

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: ive needed a hand up before.
lender.occupational_info: I give Medicine to the sick.

lender.name: Beate
lender.loan_because: I find it wonderful to see, that a little money given by few people can really help somebody to improve his and his familiy's living conditions.

lender.name: Nicola and David
lender.occupation: Stewards of 50 beautiful acres + Touch Wood Rings
lender.loan_because: KIVA is a real, tangible way to share the blessings of a good life.
lender.occupational_info: We strive to live sustainably and care for our 50 acres of meadow and forest in the Cariboo-Chilcotin area of British Columbia. We work online offering custom made and individually handcrafted wooden rings for folks all over the world. (www.touchwoodrings.com) We believe in 'right livelihood'. We appreciate having this opportunity to support folks through KIVA and our support is dedicated to Touch Wood Ring wearers everywhere.

lender.name: Michael Lopez
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. Which I hopefully do with Kiva :)

lender.name: marianne
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in the wonderful country of Canada with a good paying job & a husband with a good paying job & I feel so much for those less fortunate than we are. I'm very excited to be part of this innovative idea called Kiva. If this loan achieves what it is supposed to, it will make us so happy to have been of assistance.

lender.name: john boland
lender.loan_because: I love the small entreprenuers or capitalists of the world!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: its a great way to help others who need it.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: "Action speaks louder than words but not nearly as often." --Mark Twain

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Here are some links: http://www.facebook.com/kiva http://twitter.com/kiva

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I would like to think I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I operate an auto service centre .

lender.name: Jennifer & Kim
lender.loan_because: A hand up is more productive than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Law enforcement enviroment where we attempt to help others and provide a safe living enviroment to all involved.

lender.name: Ariana
lender.loan_because: I live in a land of plenty. Why not share its wealth?
lender.occupational_info: I work in a call centre, providing emergency service to vehicles which have broken down on the roadside.

lender.name: DADRAN
lender.loan_because: Though my gifts are small, it is my prayer that they will have a BIG impact and effect on the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I long to serve...to find others I can assist...not to be taken advantage of, but truly be of real assistance.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because:
I am an entrepreneur myself, and I know everyone needs help rich or poor.
God Bless you, Felix
P.S. Trust in the Lord with all of your heart and lean not on your own understading; in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight. Proverbs 3:5-6.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted."
lender.occupational_info: Be aware of the opportunites that the Universe presents to you each day. Commit yourself to random acts of kindness, whenever you can.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help a person to help not only themselves but also their community!
lender.occupational_info: I work to build online identities/brands for entrepreneurs and business owners around the world.

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: I like to help someone with a strong will and courage to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Fast paced and stressful.,but rewarding .

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: Helping people, giving the opportunity to improve his life to somebody who needs support, is the best and more easy way to improve our own existence, our world.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: I can help people to create their own success story

lender.name: Wouter
lender.loan_because: I have a good life en wish more people can say that also!
lender.occupational_info: Managing different departments of ING.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: it's so easy, concrete and direct. Also I love the tiny window it offers to the lives of people around the world, the feeling of being in a small way connected to them and helping to weave this network of goodness that is Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I translate books from English to Finnish.

lender.name: Zanele
lender.occupation: Arts and Craft Produt Dev elopment trainer

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: It helps, right?
lender.occupational_info: I build software applications and websites like this one.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: it is one of the easy ways to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: fitwizard
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I think it is amazing that people have the courage to start there own business. I hope that they love their work and I wish everyone success.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to. And it's far more enriching and meaningful to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a freelance basis for publishers, organisations and individuals, taking books through the entire production process of editing, design and finally printing.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: “If you can't feed a hundred people, then just feed one.” ~Mother Teresa

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure for me to support the entrepreneurs. Good luck for your business!

lender.name: Israel
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage and support people in developing countries to launch their own projects so they could enjoy better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software engineer developing large applications related to the railway sector.

lender.name: Olwyn
lender.loan_because: this way I can help individuals, directly, and without the money vanishing into some vast charity, but instead making a difference, me to you, helping people to help themselves in ways they otherwise couldn't.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life and blessings are always meant to be passed on.
lender.occupational_info: Retail manager-- either you love it or you hate it, there is no in between!

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Maya & Elijah
lender.loan_because: we have been so blessed in life.
lender.occupational_info: We spend our time making more work for mama.

lender.name: Marlo
lender.loan_because: God has called me to do this service. I want to help others in more need than myself. It is a small gift that I can pay forward.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: My job is to try to find ways to generate more business for my company. I am very involved in the green movement, concentrating on green buildings and LEED certifications.

lender.name: livingIF
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows us to make a tangible difference in the world. We believe everyone should have the opportunity to succeed and want to support people working to better the lives of them and their children.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: It is rare to find an opportunity where a modest investment can have such a large impact, so I want to take advantage of that. And it's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: fatiha
lender.loan_because: It's an honor to know that a small amount can make a difference in someone's life. Am thankfull of the opportunity
lender.occupational_info: the distance and differences are in our minds, Kiva is a great way to connect and be able to help

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupational_info: I make art for companies to sell their products.

lender.name: Cedric & Marina
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a $50.00 Kiva card for my birthday. and instructed me how to lend it.
lender.occupational_info: At 79 years old, our life is beautiful because of the love of God. We are retired so we have slowed down, but try to show the love of Christ in our activities.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: we are retired

lender.name: Sheikh Family
lender.loan_because: we are inspired by the idea of empowering people by allowing them to have a vested interest in improving their lives and their future.

lender.name: Tonnie
lender.loan_because: It is in the spirit of love and compassion. I feel blessed to be able to extend an opportunity to someone else. Give a hand not a hand out.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.occupational_info: I help students decide what they want to do after high school.

lender.name: Chris and Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We can all help.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I want to enable women to become successful and independent.
lender.occupational_info: I sell tshirts and bags with designs that I apply by hand.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra money saved and wanted to help someone improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects so they are completed by the deadline.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: It makes a huge difference in people's lives!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: What I Have been trying to...Is Buy Merchindise, from companies that are closing, And sell them at the lowest cost possible to Poverty level people, that can no afford them at cost

lender.name: SeattleGoalClub
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends living in Seattle that got together to help one another attain some personal and professional goals. We decided to use our "penalty jar" money (for not meeting milestones) to help others attain their goals through Kiva.org.

lender.name: MN Mompreneur
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving back to such a valuable cause. It is amazing to watch the progress that is made.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entreprenuers to help them become successful business owners and I know how important funding can be.

lender.name: NSD
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me and called me to share those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Electronics.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Social investment is just as important (and has just as high of returns) as financial investments.
lender.occupational_info: I study the intersection of development issues and finance at a university in South Africa. I am currently serving as a Kiva Fellow in Kisumu, Kenya with K-MET.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and have spent a great deal of my life personally and professionally nurturing and encouraging that spirit..
Through Kiva, I am not only able to support the entrepreneurial spirit but, am able to contribute to a global movement that empowers people to positively impact the quality of life for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I provide people with resources, knowledge, techniques, motivation and support to provoke new thinking and encourage entrepreneurial behavior.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: h l
lender.loan_because: i have the (small amount of) funds to spare for the time being, and it does a much better job of helping the world by spreading it around temporarily than if i just leave it sitting in my account.
lender.occupational_info: just trying to help women with their ideas of how to help clothe and/or feed others.

lender.name: Season
lender.loan_because: I am able and happy to do so. I think that person-to-person micro-finance is an awesome way to affect improvement in people's lives in a very grass-roots way.

lender.name: Bill & Sherry Seaver
lender.loan_because: I am believe in helping people where I can.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired high technology (IBM and Digital Equipment) people who enjoy international travel and supporting people in other countries. Sherry is interested in holistic health and Bill is interested in Buddhism.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit event planning

lender.name: Jules
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design house-wares at my day-job and fashion/travel accessories at night for my own company.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have a healthy, loving family, comfortable home and a job.

lender.name: Srini
lender.loan_because: I like to learn about folks that have the drive to overcome adversity
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: that's what Brian Boitano would do.
lender.occupational_info: I keep many large computers operational.

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and lived in a number of countries with extreme poverty and see this as a way to help a few get out of poverty with a little help from their friends.
lender.occupational_info: Retired executive for scientific and medical instrument companies located throughout the world.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, and you've fed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you've fed him for his lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses operate more efficiently.

lender.name: Ada
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps. A small loan from each of us makes a big difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the reason why I am here.
lender.occupational_info: My interests are in helping high conflict areas in the world, particularly Palestine, and to encourage Americans to try to understand the world outside themselves.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: it's a much better way to spend my money.
lender.occupational_info: I test rockets that will be used for space travel.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: we need to help others when we have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: help business managers by providing accounting data.

lender.name: Ally
lender.loan_because: This site makes it so easy to really see how much your helping these entrepreneurs, and changing their lives. It also makes me feel more thankful everyday for my family and life here.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place, in a real way.

lender.name: Shawn&Helen
lender.loan_because: We believe that all the peoples of the world are members of just one family and that each and everyone is created noble.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help individuals, not organizations.

lender.name: Matt & Denise
lender.loan_because: Making a difference, in such a personal way, has never been so easy.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Bath (England) with our mad cat Zac.

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because: I thank God for all I have in my life and I want to act on his word. All the best for you!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work as as a teacher for nursing.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the world and give people an opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I works as an editor, but I want to become an architect.

lender.name: Lasse Jægergaard
lender.loan_because: Helping each other is the only right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: All that is worthwhile

lender.name: Mamiko
lender.loan_because: I think this system is wonderful to be of any contribution to support people from all over the globe.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I think it's fair that people get the opportunity to use their skills and profit from it
lender.occupational_info: I create websites

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: IT , Business Consultant, NLP & timeline therapist
lender.loan_because: I believe in prosperity for all in all things.
lender.occupational_info: I support teams of people in acheiving their goals in business, technology and personally. I also produce a radio show - www.infiniteloveradio.com

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I know where this money is going, and I can lend it over and over again.

lender.name: Guide Me Green
lender.loan_because: I have travelled extensively and have a Master degree in Development Studies and have seen first hand the difficulties of obtaining finance to get ahead in life. In the West new business start ups often re-mortgage a house or obtain a loan from a bank. Imagine if you couldnt do this? Obtaining a £20,000 loan for a small business from friends and family in the UK is like a person on Kiva obtaining $100. Virtually impossible without very wealthy friends-which not many of us have - do you?
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to lead a greener and more ethical way of life! Join our green community which is constantly changing as funds permit...

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel better.
lender.occupational_info: I help other companies and local government make better strategic decisions in their development.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to live in the over-developed world and want to help even things out.

lender.name: Dave & Sandy
lender.loan_because: we feel that we all have an obligation to help each other.

lender.name: Ernst
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and the values behind it - a great oppurtunity to help those committet people in a easy and efficient way!
lender.occupational_info: Iam doing research in traffic-psychology and in the field of Hazard Perception & Situation Awareness in critical driving situations.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: In keeping with the principle of Tzedakah and the message of the Rambam, I anticipate charity by preventing poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator and former classroom teacher at a university prep school in the United States.

lender.name: Mads
lender.loan_because: irespective of how good your ideas are or how hard you work, without capital the entrepreneurial triangle of crativity/labour/capital will not work

lender.name: Junya
lender.loan_because: I want to do something for making the world a better place.

lender.name: Jarred
lender.loan_because: It's an enjoyable way to help others as they work to improve their own lives.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my own abundance and it gives me joy to share it, so others can be abundant too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Document Examiner and I also teach on signature and document forgery

lender.name: Edo & Rita
lender.loan_because: We believe that everybody should have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Edo repairs broken equipments in hospitals, while Rita works in a marketing department.

lender.name: arik and michelle
lender.loan_because: we are incredibly blessed!
lender.occupational_info: We make intentional and creative stuff full of good juju, people buy our stuff instead of other stuff and it allows us to help others prosper. Our mission is that this be a blessing for everyone involved.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I am not doing anything too important with my money right now, perhaps someone else can make better use of it.
lender.occupational_info: I study the brain in order to understand how we are able to form long-term memories. With this information, perhaps humanity will be able to prevent problems like Alzheimer's disease.

lender.name: Vincent MacNeil
lender.loan_because: People are born equal in dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the development of public policy. I assist people with research, planning and communications.

lender.name: IanPM
lender.loan_because: I like to see where my money is going, I like that personal connection. Also it's not charity, it's allowing people to make their own way.
lender.occupational_info: I design logos, books, advertising, usually to help a company or organisation communicate what they do. My speciality is designing typefaces either for sale or for a particular client.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Do you know a better way to help somebody you don't even know but whose project seems to be so human, right and courageous ?

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and have no idea what I'm going to do when I finish. I volunteer at a local animal shelter doing basic cat care and for the American Red Cross. I am on the disaster action team for them and work with victims to provide emergency sevices (like food, shelter, clothes, baby items, blankets, etc.). We provide comfort items to the families in the local area that are affected by disasters (mostly fires here).

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I care and wish that we all had equal opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Media Sales and Communication

lender.name: Caity
lender.loan_because: I believe that my higher power provides me the opportunity to do a little good every day with. Miracles happen!
lender.occupational_info:
I manage a shelter and transitional housing program for women and children escaping violence in their homes.
I also recently received my Master's degree in Nonprofit Leadership & Management - someday I want to work in international women's rights.
www.sandiego.edu/soles/centers/nonprofit/

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am a woman entrepreneur that believes in the power of "woman's work" to make our world a stronger and more peaceful place. I am grateful for all the support I have and want to be that support to others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company called Glitter & Razz Productions that works with young children teaching theater classes and camps where they create and perform their own plays while learning how to be more creative and better friends to each other.

lender.name: Hanno Maliepaard
lender.loan_because: I like to help people getting started and give them the opporunity to realise their plans.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medicines and tell people how to deal with their medicines. Beside that I like to improve the ICT a pharmacist use in my country

lender.name: Great-grandma
lender.loan_because: It makes my day !

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I hope that in some way, my contribution can make a difference for someone whose need for it is greater than mine
lender.occupational_info: I work for a public library system whose mission is to provide free information services, reading materials and educational resources to residents of all ages

lender.name: Helmers
lender.loan_because: others can use my money better than me..
lender.occupational_info: i stare at a computer screen 10 hours a day, trying to build software...

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: all kinds of things! right now: movie accountant

lender.name: Mirela
lender.loan_because: i wont hapl this women with her plans i think she can make the do that ja hocu da pomognem ovoj zeni s njenim planom jer mislim da moze da uradi to
lender.occupational_info: i working with kids i care two kids i came in usa last year and i take care two kids boy and girl i will back home in march 2009 moj posao je rad s djecom ja sam dosla u ameriku prosle godine ja cuvam dvoje djece djecaka i djevojcicu i ja cu se vratiti kuci u martu 2009

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the accounting and computers in my family business.

lender.name: Ester
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone deserves to have more opportunities and purchase their aspirations.

lender.name: Blake & Karin
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank as a credit analyst, and my wife is an account manager for a pharmaceutical distributor.

lender.name: Daniela and Andreas
lender.loan_because: We want to share and to support new entrepreneurs. And yes, we just love Kiva's idea!

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: Loans offer me a way to help but get my money back to reinvest all with the same initial capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Computer Engineer. I will design things like, cell phones, computers, radios, anything that has circuit or processors in them.

lender.name: alden
lender.loan_because: from my travels around the world I have seen first hand the challenges of people to support themselves and their families. It gives me great satisfaction to think that I am helping some of those families with my loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a financial services company. I oversee a department of 21 backoffice staff that support the operations of our automated teller machine (ATM) and cheque/electronic payment functions

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.occupation: Web Project Manager, Reiki Master Teacher

lender.name: Kamal
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It helps me connect to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach primary school in a small village in Alaska helping students to read and write English and their native language.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Manu
lender.loan_because: i believe less in handouts, and more in providing sustainability
lender.occupational_info: i help finance endeavors... cant think of something better than kiva organizations

lender.name: Paul & Mary
lender.loan_because: We would like to help out others who may not be as fortunate as us, but who have that "dream and desire" to do the best they can for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Elevator Construction Supervisor in a major city. I have been working in the Elevator business for over 40 years. I strive to do the best I can at my work, and this has allowed me to provide a good home for my family. Mary and I have been married for 32 years. Our Son is now in University, and my Wife drives a School Bus in our community and enjoys her time with the school children.

lender.name: Divine Providence
lender.loan_because: it is my wish to help ease the suffering of all sentient beings.
lender.occupational_info: I find great people and get them great jobs.

lender.name: John R
lender.loan_because: People with influence and affluence have a duty to help those with less of it

lender.name: Zena
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe we all share a responsiblility for one another.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life and I want to share some of my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find suitable homes for them to buy.

lender.name: Sophie Tavoukjian
lender.loan_because: A small $um to get the Ball of Self Determination rolling could make the world of difference...

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: A little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: People all over the world are connected. We are fortunate in North A merica because of geography. We all have a responsibility to be our brother and sisters keepers.
lender.occupational_info: I am the change I hope to see in the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that the money comes back to you over twelve months so that you can lend it out again. I feel that this way, the money does more good than if I had just donated it to charity.
lender.occupational_info: Bond Portfolio Manager

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the responsibility of people who are financially able to help those who need help-- both monetarily and emotionally
lender.occupational_info: I worked with children who had special learning problems. I have taught many children to read and do basic arithmetic. Presently I do a lot of volunteering.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: The world needs positive energy.
lender.occupational_info: My work is collecting individual objects to create a whole. My art shows offer a singular gift of beauty, sets of objects from a wordwide talent pool. Kiva allows me another way to be part of something bigger than myself. Future loans are dedicated to my little dog Muffy, who at almost 17 years of age, lost her battle with kidney disease on Jan. 14, 2010. She was a loving child who shared her life and love with me without question.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to share the hope of a prosperous tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I write about technical subjects for big companies who wish to get business from the U.S. government

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I've observed firsthand the failure of the so-called safety net, and I believe free market solutions like Kiva to be a significant improvement.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student who most recently worked for the government of New York State, specifically in the Legislature.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference. It can change somebodies life, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: Working with communities to alleviate poverty.

lender.name: BuwahBoy
lender.loan_because: I love to be a conduit to success for those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: My work is spent dealing with humanitarian issues in West Africa ~ Sénégal.

lender.name: Mas
lender.loan_because: I am thankfull for my life and would like to help to encourage others in their enterprises to work towards a better life for their family and create the ripple effect to their Community -hopefully improving the lives of many.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I believe we can help spread peace throughout the world, by helping create wealth and a sense of global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Akron. I major in English, and am a writer.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is a wonderful way of helping women who find it hard to get loans otherwise
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher and then worked for the British Humanist Association.

lender.name: Werner & Tapsy
David
lender.loan_because: I like to help fellow entrepreneurs succeed in their adventure and be in a position to help others in their own community.
lender.occupational_info: My business DAVit is related to preserving heritage and advancing communication with the world.

lender.name: ymery.com
lender.loan_because: We help each other to give an impulse to the trade in the world, to help every one of us a step further and to lay the basis for everyone to in the end achieve greater success.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.occupational_info: I study volcanoes and how magmas are created in the deep earth and how they make their way up to the surface through volcanic eruptions.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to live a life with ease and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Government of Canada but am an entrepreneur at heart. I always have a venture or two on the go.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel it's my responsibility to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international investment management company that includes a family of mutual funds. I work on the service side of the business and currently lead a large strategic initiative related to how we deliver our service to our customers.

lender.name: Linnea
lender.loan_because: I must pass it on.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: Because I am in the great position that I can help others
lender.occupational_info: Legal assistant at IP department of adidas

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I can accomplish something in the way of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy or sell property.

lender.name: Erin and Scott
lender.loan_because: Sharing in God's Blessings
lender.occupational_info: Scott and I both work in the oil and gas industry

lender.name: Randy and Mardelle
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we desire to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: We provide eye health care and glasses in a rural community in Montana, USA.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves

lender.name: Morgyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a center for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing 40 hours per week. This allows me to continue to do my own artwork (prints, paintings, etc.)

lender.name: muzaffer
lender.loan_because: I love people getting back on their feet
lender.occupational_info: I am an energy healer, supporting the healing of myself and the planet.

lender.name: Family-Affairs.org
lender.occupational_info: The mission of Family Affairs is twofold; helping families in transition by providing easily accessable and low cost access to an excellent parenting education program and materials, and secondly, using those fees to benefit charitable organizations.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I realize that the near future is one with a global world, not a localized one. The welfare of others can slowly and turn into the growth of a community which, in time, might just support the growth of a country.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Manager, Online and Social Media Strategy

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help others.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to share my good fortune with others, so that hopefully, one day, they can share theirs.

lender.name: Rolf T.
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to draw pipelines...

lender.name: Nick and Robin
lender.loan_because: We have received assistance, and other people are in need of assistance. We hope this micro-loan will do good and keep the world economy going. We received our first Kiva lender gift certificate from Uncle Steve.
lender.occupational_info: We are taught by our mom and other people. Nick likes studying history and playing soccer; Robin likes to do parkour, science, and ballet.
